messages.content: What is the purpose of the ComfyUI Tab Handler extension?
The ComfyUI Tab Handler extension intercepts the default browser behavior when pressing the 'Tab' key and focuses the 'textarea' instead.
Why was the ComfyUI Tab Handler extension created?
The ComfyUI Tab Handler extension was created because ComfyUI doesn't handle the 'Tab' key by default, which may result in highlighting browser tabs or favorites when pressed.
How does the ComfyUI Tab Handler extension modify the 'Tab' key behavior?
The ComfyUI Tab Handler extension blocks the default 'Tab' key behavior and makes it switch between the 'textareas' (text inputs such as prompts) instead.
Is the ComfyUI Tab Handler extension a standalone application?
No, the ComfyUI Tab Handler extension is not a standalone application. It is an extension for ComfyUI.
ComfyUI is a GUI that uses a stable diffusion model to generate images and videos.
Does ComfyUI handle the 'Tab' key by default?
No, ComfyUI does not handle the 'Tab' key by default, which is why the ComfyUI Tab Handler extension was created.
What happens when you press the 'Tab' key in ComfyUI without the Tab Handler extension?
When you press the 'Tab' key in ComfyUI without the Tab Handler extension, it may start highlighting your browser tabs or favorites.
